definition[0]: a woman that a man has a sexual relationship with, even though he is married to someone else
example[0]: The prince had shocked society by living openly with his mistress.
definition[2]: the female owner of a dog, horse etc
definition[3]: the female employer of a servant
example[2]: The maid looked nervously at her mistress.
